text:
@piersmorgan https://t.co/fDHavLhC5z
Anyone seen this statistics showing children that had the flu shots are MORE likely to get other upper respiratory infections such as Coronavirus? Hope they are checking this to see if the flu shots are making people susceptible to Coronavirus??
